ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Stephanie Igtiben, Badea Akel, Magd Akel, Wageha (Juju) Akel, Scott Bergmann, Leslie Corcelli, Kam-Len Diaz, Scott Duncan, Ally Gundlach, Breanna Lee, Renata Orna, Kelly Plotz, and Tina Tran for help with the growth chamber experiment. We benefited from discussions with Christine Hawkes regarding the experimental design. Ken Fedorka, David Jenkins, and Pedro Quintana-Ascencio generously loaned their growth chambers for the duration of the experiment. Don George, Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, assisted in locating Eugenia hammock sites in central Florida. We appreciate the assistance of Muray Friedman and Yolanda Ortiz in collecting seeds for the southern sites and Stephanie Igtiben in collecting seeds for the northern sites. Comments from two anonymous reviewers and Section Editor Dr. Jean Burns improved this manuscript. This manuscript is based on work done by BvH while serving at the U.S. National Science Foundation. The views expressed in this paper do not necessarily reflect those of the National Science Foundation.
